description: Students expand their skills by continuing to listen, speak, read, and write on such topics as the concept of time, leisure activities, and culinary traditions in North American and Hispanic cultures. Additional work is completed in the World Languages Center. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: SPAN 111 or placement.
name: Intro Spanish Language/World II
notes: Prerequisite: completion of Spanish placement test or preceding course.
title: Beginning Spanish II
